page.title: 11My Hobby,Cannington
page.content: I have a hobby which is called majorettes.I practice in a school every Monday and Friday at night.We march and twirl a baton which is a metal stick with rubber ends.I joined when I was seven and have been in two troupes since then.In my club we have got a band but some troupes have got taped music.Our uniform is darkish blue with a white design and has got a cape at the back.The band wear white trousers with blue and white tops.Our hats are tall with white fur on them with a blue emblem.The troupe I belong to are the Bridgwater Kestrels.The band's instruments are the beliah,drums,cymbals and bass drum.Leading us is a Drum Major with a mace who shouts out directions.
